# 📊 Netflix Data Analysis Project  

![Project Logo](logo.png)  

## 🎯 Objective  
This project aims to analyze Netflix's dataset using **SQL** to extract meaningful insights, helping to understand content trends, genres, and regional preferences.  

## 📂 Dataset  
The dataset consists of various attributes, including:  
- **Show ID**  
- **Type** (Movie/TV Show)  
- **Title**  
- **Director & Cast**  
- **Country & Date Added**  
- **Release Year & Rating**  
- **Duration & Listed Genres**  
- **Description**  

## 🔍 Analysis Performed  
✅ Identified the most popular genres and content types  
✅ Analyzed the growth of Netflix’s content over the years  
✅ Explored regional content distribution  
✅ Filtered movies and TV shows based on rating and duration  

## 📌 SQL Queries Used  
- Extracting top genres by frequency  
- Finding the most active directors and actors  
- Analyzing content trends over time  
- Filtering content by rating and region  

## 📊 Visualization  
Results were visualized using **Tableau/Power BI** to better interpret the patterns and trends.  

## 🚀 Key Insights  
📌 Netflix has seen a surge in content additions post-2015  
📌 Movies dominate over TV shows in numbers  
📌 Certain genres are more prominent in specific regions  

## 💡 Future Scope  
🔹 Sentiment analysis of descriptions  
🔹 Predicting content trends using ML  
🔹 Deeper insights into audience engagement
